author: ema
msg: Comment "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema.dtd" to avoid connection timeout error when w3c.org break down

author: andreasmyth
msg: Removed ConfigurationBuilderFactory - a ConfigurationBuilder is made available through the bus (rt and rt2).

org.objectweb.celtix.configuration.impl.ConfigurationBuilderImpl and derived CeltixConfigurationBuilder can be constructed with a URL that is injected into the default ConfigurationProvider supplied for each ConfigurationObject they build.
The use of this URL is at the discretion of the provider, e.g. the Spring based provider uses it to identify the bean configuration file.

Spring based providers created by a configuration builder that was constructed without a URL default to using system property celtix.config.file - therefore no changes to system tests and demos required.
